attributes.action: make Yorkshire Day (August the first) a public holiday for residents of the former three Ridings of Yorkshire and the City of York (as their borders existed up to 31st March 1974).
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government appears to be in favour of an additional public holiday and also separate government for the English regions of which Yorkshire is one. This is an early application on behalf of England's largest county.
